mapper.select: SELECT FINS.INS_CD, F.FC_NAME, FINS.INS_DT, CASE WHEN FINS.INS_CAT = 0 THEN '정기' WHEN FINS.INS_CAT = 1 THEN '수기' ELSE '기타' END AS INS_CAT , FINS.INS_CONT, FINS.CC, FINS. CHG, FINS.FC_CD, CASE WHEN F.ST = 0 THEN '가동' ELSE '비가동' END AS ST FROM FC_INS FINS JOIN FC F ON FINS.FC_CD = F.FC_CD ORDER BY FINS.INS_DT DESC

SELECT FINS.INS_CD, F.FC_NAME, FINS.INS_DT, FINS.INS_CAT, FINS.INS_CONT, FINS.CC, FINS. CHG, FINS.FC_CD FROM FC_INS FINS JOIN FC F ON FINS.FC_CD = F.FC_CD where FINS.ins_cd = #{insCd} ORDER BY FINS.INS_DT DESC
